an3.6:1.1: “A fool is known by three things.
an3.6:1.3: Unskillful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.6:1.4: These are the three things by which a fool is known.
an3.6:2.1: An astute person is known by three things.
an3.6:2.3: Skillful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.6:2.4: These are the three things by which an astute person is known.
